page.title: 02WARREN FARM, ROMFORD
page.content: Warren Farm is a 900 acre arable farm in the middle of a built up area. It is bordered by Chadwell Heath on the West and Romford on the East. Winter wheat,winter and spring barley,rape and potatoes are grown. Although it is convenient for the farmer and his family to be near many amenities the farm suffers from some vandalism.Machinery gets smashed and fires are lit. The farm has been owned by the same family for 87 years but the day to day running is left to a farm manager and 4 staff.The family have had many offers from builders to to buy the farm for housing development,but they have no intention of selling it.
